contentText.value: Our neural pathways have become accustomed to your sensory input patterns. The "unexpected" is our normal routine. Fate. It protects fools, little children, and ships named Enterprise. Earl Grey tea, watercress sandwiches... and Bularian canapés? Are you up for promotion? Is it my imagination, or have tempers become a little frayed on the ship lately? In all trust, there is the possibility for betrayal.
